name: Fried Sage Leaves
recipeIngredient: Sage leaves, rinsed and patted dry

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium skillet, heat 1/4 inch oil over medium-high heat until hot enough to toast a bread crumb in 30 seconds. Toss sage in flour, shake vigorously to remove as much flour as possible and fry, 30 seconds per side. Drain on paper towels, sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve with cocktails.
